decision: Unified Codebase and Deployment: Develop the application as a single project using React for the front end and Spring Boot for the back end. Enable horizontal scaling with a load balancer (e.g., AWS Elastic Load Balancer) to distribute traffic during high-demand periods such as Black Friday.

External Integrations: Utilize APIs to connect with external inventory management systems for realtime stock synchronization, minimizing overselling or stockouts. Integrate with third-party payment gateways such as Stripe and PayPal using their SDKs or APIs to process secure payments, ensuring full compliance with PCI-DSS standards.
